name: CodeCop Rules
description: Professional CodeCop ruleset for Business Central development

rules.justification: Variables must have meaningful names
Use StrSubstNo instead of string concatenation
Use CamelCase naming for procedures
Use documented procedures for exit points
Variables must be declared in alphabetical order
Page fields must have ToolTips
Use standard handling for events
Use UPPERCASE for reserved words
Define object ID ranges in app.json
Prefer text constants over hard-coded text
Fields must match appropriate data types
Use correct spacing in statements
Do not use WITH statements
Procedure size must not exceed 100 lines
Don't hardcode URLs
Variables must use proper naming conventions
Avoid single line statements with IF
Always specify DataClassification for table fields
Avoid implicit WITH statements
Provide procedures with meaningful parameter names
